name: 3D Plattformer
description:
In the fantastic game platformer, it's about completing all the levels and collecting the diamonds.

To solve the levels you have to jump from platform to platform.

There are many obstacles and challenges.

But also decorations like apples or realistic textures

Mindestens 1gb ssd 4gb ram gtx 760 intel i3
